deploy.startCommand: sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/share/fonts/ && sudo cp font/AppleGothic.ttf /usr/local/share/fonts/ && sudo fc-cache -fv && streamlit run main.py --server.address 0.0.0.0 --server.port $PORT --server.fileWatcherType none --browser.gatherUsageStats false --client.showErrorDetails false --client.toolbarMode minimal
